statements: UPDATE website_traffic_data SET time_on_page = '1 hour' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE website_traffic_data SET referrer_url = 'www.example.com' WHERE page_url = 'homepage';
UPDATE website_traffic_data SET time_on_page = '00:30:00' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE website_traffic_data SET referrer_url = 'https://google.com', campaign_id = 101 WHERE visit_date = '2022-01-15';
UPDATE website_traffic_data SET visitor_id = 1001 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE marketing_campaigns SET budget = 15000.50, target_audience = 'Tech Enthusiasts' WHERE campaign_id = 101;
UPDATE website_traffic_data SET visitor_id = 1001, traffic_source = 'Social Media' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE marketing_campaigns SET budget = 25000.00, target_audience = 'Young Adults' WHERE campaign_id = 101;
UPDATE website_traffic_data SET time_spent_on_page = 120 WHERE visit_id = 1001
UPDATE website_traffic_data SET page_visited = 'Homepage', visitor_id = 2002 WHERE visit_id = 1005
UPDATE website_traffic_data SET time_spent_on_page = 60, page_visited = 'Homepage' WHERE visit_id = 1001;
UPDATE website_traffic_data SET campaign_id = 101, visitor_id = 2001 WHERE visit_date = '2022-09-15';
UPDATE WebsiteVisitors SET visitor_name='John Doe' WHERE visitor_id=1;
UPDATE Campaigns SET budget=5000, end_date='2023-12-31' WHERE campaign_id=2;
UPDATE WebsiteVisitors SET visitor_name='John Doe', page_visited='Homepage' WHERE visitor_id=1;
UPDATE Campaigns SET budget=5000.00, end_date='2023-03-31', start_date='2023-01-01' WHERE campaign_id=3;
UPDATE website_traffic_data SET page_url = 'updated_page_url', visit_timestamp = '2022-09-15 10:30:00' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE referrer_details SET referrer_type = 'Organic' WHERE referrer_id = 5;
UPDATE website_traffic_data SET page_url = 'example.com/page1', referrer_url = 'ref.com/page1' WHERE visitor_id = 123 AND campaign_id = 456;
UPDATE visitor_details SET browser = 'Chrome', os = 'Windows 10' WHERE ip_address = '192.168.1.1';
